reviews.review: Love it or hate it, it's cs. Fun to play with friends and hate to solo que
Ruslar,troller ve hileler stressiz hayatınıza stres eklemek için birebir

When you are ready to watch tutorials of this game 24/7, and waste much time of your life on learning and practicing, its a must have. I only have 100 hours at cs so far, but I think by adding the time I wasted on watching tutorials and stuff, I come up to 300 hours of  enjoying this masterpiece of game.... luv it
Back playing after years away... just too good! Even being a noob!
This game is the digital equivalent of heroin, no matter how bad and terrible it is we keep crawling back to get our fix of this sweet sweet nectar.

1600 hours. Must be good right?

Well if you want a round based shooter this is the best one by far.
Its simple, easy to learn but hard to master.

The toughest part is the multiplayer aspect, your teamates and enemies.
A free to player game draws alot of cheaters, griefers, angry and toxic people.
It can be frustrating to play a game where all these people mix and most games one of the 10 players will be these annoying fools.

If you can handle the toxic nature of humanity then the game basis is great. It can be a bit weird with bullets not registring, frustrating shots and alot of luck, but if you get good - you will dominate.
You'll wanna die until you get good.

Besides the normal issues with the game. I bought the new broken fang pass to play the new ranked mode and if you arent high rank its a waste of time. I am GN1 and all i play against is globals and LE's. Valve has so much money and doesnt try to fix anything. It's just a doomed game thats neglected by its makers. Sad too the game used to be fun. I just dont know how nothing can be fixed with so much money in this game. Thanks for nothing valve and I hope you start using your money to fix things rather then just let your games die. Left for dead and half life are other examples too.

I stopped the game in 2015 and started it again in 2021. It has a huge difference in the characters of the players you can meet within the game. In 2 consecutive games you can find toxic people who have no fate in the sun and in another you can find very decent people who came in to play their game. I recommend the game, but avoid joking or encouraging your teammates. Because in my country they say " Give courage to the villager to get on your bed "
